next.excerpt:
When you look at the hot section of wsb on a given weekday, at least half of the
hot posts are a screenshot of someones position, usually a yolo. These are
entertaining, and generally we consider these as proof of positions. But they
shouldn't be. I'm no inspect element or photoshop expert but it…
next.title: With fake yolos being easy to make, what is a way to actually prove someones position on reddit considering screenshots can be compromised?

localize.title: 在假悠悠很容易制作的情况下，考虑到截图可能会被泄露，有什么办法可以真正证明某个人在reddit上的立场？

当你在某个工作日看wsb的热点栏目时，至少有一半的

娱乐性，一般我们认为这些是立场的证明。但它们
不应该是。我不是检查元素或Photoshop专家，但它... ...
